description.value:
Once per round as a half action, user can activate this with a +0 Tech-Use Test. If succeeding, everyone within the 20 metre, 90 Degree firing arc, makes -20 Strength Test. If they fail, their Agility Bonus is reduced by 1d5 for the purposes of movement until the end of their next turn, and are knocked prone if they had 3+ DoF.

Requirements

Xenotech. +20 to Acquisition Tests for this item if acquired through Friendly Tau Settlement.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
